COVID-19 Analysis

This is not an official analysis, this is for internal checking of the data only.

```{r}
# load libraries
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning=FALSE, message=FALSE)
library(dplyr)
library(DT)
```

```{r}
# read data, factor date
raw <- read.csv('tweets_US_states_counties.csv') %>% 
  mutate(
    date = as.Date(date, format= "%Y-%m-%d")
  )

raw %>% 
  head()
```

```{r}
raw %>% 
  nrow()
```

The total sum of tweets

```{r}
raw %>% 
  subset(select= date) %>% 
  group_by(date) %>% 
  summarise(
    count = n()
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    total_sum = cumsum(count)
  ) %>% 
  arrange(date)
```



```{r}
raw %>% 
  group_by(proj_state) %>% 
  summarise(
    count = n()
  ) %>% 
  arrange(-count)
```
